content.title: 郵便配達員、娘、学生が拉致された90億ユーロの誘拐容疑で男（53）が見つかりました -  Independent.ie
タイガー誘拐裁判が続く - アングロ・ケルト
content.desc: A prosecutor in a €90,000 tiger kidnapping trial told the jury the “critical mass of evidence does not leave any room for reasonable uncertainty” other than that the ...

content.title: ポスト夫人、娘と学生の虎の誘拐の有罪の男 -  Independent.ie
キャバンの男が90,000ユーロの拉致とダブリンのポスト・アダルト強盗の有罪判決を受けた - アイルランド審査官
content.desc: A Cavan man has been convicted of a €90,000 tiger kidnapping four years ago in which a postmistress, her daughter and an Italian student were abducted from their home. Paschal Kelly, 53, with an address at Cootehill, Co Cavan, had pleaded not guilty to trespass and to false imprisonment of postmistress Susan Lawlor, her daughter Emma Carter and Italian student Gabriella Saisa at Seabury Drive, Malahide, Dublin, on September 25, 2014. Kelly had also pleaded not guilty to robbing Ms Lawlor of cash at Bayside Post Office, Sutton, Dublin, and threatening to kill her, Ms Carter and Ms Saisa at a...
